name: Card Joust
description:
Card Joust is a card battling game where you have to play your cards right, literally! Move your cards to the right side of the board while blocking your opponent from reaching the left.

This project was created for Game Off 2022. The game is based on the cliché "play your cards right".

The source code for this game is available here: https://github.com/Mikroscopic/card-joust
